title: MONEY: Message to the Makers: Tencent wants to make money, start with selling me.
body:
Anyone who pays to play, gets to play in 5v5 first week.
this is why i feel this would be worth the time.



I bought the new champion the day it released after work.

I have spent around 3-4 hours in cue waiting to play him.

When i go into draft pick:
 - gets banned
 - gets picked
 - someone dodges if i pick
 - timer gets too long and i get fill
 - someone dodges if i attempt to pick as support
 - threatened to be reported, idc i would like to attempt to play, someone dodges.

when i go into blind pick:
 - someone picks
 - someone spams role for jungle faster
 - if i spam jungle and get it, someone locks for top or mid or adc or sup
 - if i instantly lock without role, someone dodges or forced into support

it is now the 17th and i have been in maybe 15 lobbies and finally i got into a team draft as jungle, was going to pick...

enemy team picks first pick, i dodge. Now I'm on a 6 minute leave buster because im the pos who left finally after all of this bs.

im going to blind and going to spam it until i get it regardless of role, this is beyond words describing non capable existence.

why would anyone pay money to have to wait 2 weeks to play the champion.

WE NEED A 1v1 MODE ON ARAM UPON NEW CHAMP RELEASE WHERE ANYONE CAN PLAY. EVEN 5V5 WHERE EVERYONE CAN BE THE NEW CHAMP, EVERYONE CAN EXPERIENCE MECHANICS IN GAME, EVERYONE HAS A CHANCE TO PLAY.

1 weeks, every new champ release, make it happen, make money, succeed as a company, and have a nice day everyone.
your welcome.

replies.body:
easiest solution.

put one for all on rotating game mode que for the week a new champion is released. everyone gets to play him and experiment with him in a non competitve environment.
Make it like Overwatch. When they release a new hero, they release a mode where that can be like 3 or 4 Doomfists.

I had no problem playing him the first day I got him.

What I did was I went to blind, picked Kayn, then called whatever was open out of mid, top, or jg.

There were only two times that I picked him and those lanes were all taken, which I dodged.

we need 1v1s, maybe 2v2s...


but we need team builder for sure.
